name: Iniquity Demo: Beta
description:
You're an exorcist name Father Martin who just got a call from one of your congregants that needed a visit them in the middle of the night after

NOTE this game is in beta there are bugs and Glitches if you find some write a comment down below.

NOTE 
The name was changed from "Sanctified"  due to already being a PS1 game with the same name.

controls

WASD to move
Mouse and left and right click to do the action buttons
middle Mouse wheel to change weapons

I for inventory
